Exaggerate: The claim may be exaggerating the number of jobs created at the Milwaukee Job Corps Center by stating that "more than 125 jobs have been created" when these are actually federally funded staff positions at the center itself.
Understate: The claim may be understating the fact that the Milwaukee Job Corps Center had not yet opened for business when the statement about job creation was made.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support or evidence to substantiate the number of jobs created at the Milwaukee Job Corps Center.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the creation of federally funded staff positions at the Job Corps facility can be equated to job creation in the private sector.
Exist alternative explanation: An alternative explanation exists that the jobs mentioned in the claim are not new jobs but rather existing positions at the Job Corps facility.
